title: Midterm Debate Domination with Marjorie Taylor Greene and Kurt Schlichter
itunes:title: Midterm Debate Domination with Marjorie Taylor Greene and Kurt Schlichter
description:
At the start of 2021, Washington's sneering class laughed at Marjorie Taylor Greene. Now, she sets the tone for the GOP by daring to call out the left's child mutilation, anti-white racism, and more. Charlie talks with MTG about her big debate win, and why it may be better to vote early than on election day. Plus, Kurt Schlichter joins to talk about his latest conservative action novel and the signs of a coming red wave.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
